structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT

text.section:
Sec. 8A-210. Pawnbrokers; reports to Director; penalty.
Every person engaged in the business of pawnbrokers, receipted under of this chapter shall make monthly reports to the Director of the Miami-Dade Police Department of the information required to be maintained by such pawnbrokers under the provisions of of this chapter, and any person failing to make such report shall be subject to the penalty provided in said section. Forms for the preparation of the reports required herein shall be prescribed and furnished by the Miami-Dade Police Department.
